CustomField.formula:
IF( Region__c = Text($CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Region__c) , CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB_Quebec.Delivery_Post__c , '115' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR_Quebec.Delivery_Post__c , '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL_Quebec.Delivery_Post__c , '110' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT_Quebec.Delivery_Post__c , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC_Quebec.Delivery_Post__c ,
'' ), CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB.Delivery_Post__c , '115' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR.Delivery_Post__c , '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL.Delivery_Post__c , '110' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT.Delivery_Post__c , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC.Delivery_Post__c ,
'' ) )
CustomField.label: Signature Delivery Post
